content: >http://cnews.canoe.ca/CNEWS/WeirdNews/2009/05/22/9538246-ap.html Mary Kay Letourneau, the notorious former teacher, and her husband, the samoan student for whom she spent a few years in jail, these days are 'entertainers' of a sort. Vaguely reminiscent of State fair sideshows and vaudeville 'appearances', getting ordinary work, for this pair, must be difficult.
reply: >http://cnews.canoe.ca/CNEWS/WeirdNews/2009/05/22/9538246-ap.html Mary Kay Letourneau, the notorious former teacher, and her husband, the samoan student for whom she spent a few years in jail, these days are 'entertainers' of a sort. title: A Heckuva Way to Make a Living

content: Not much longer and he'll dump her for a young thang...
